be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.project

Class EditTaskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.project.EditTaskController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditTaskViewController.Listener

    public class EditTaskController
extends java.lang.Object
implements EditTaskViewController.Listener
    Edit Task Controller handles the control of the edit task scene. It is the class where the user can edit the tasks of his project.

        public void validate(java.lang.String newDescription,
                     java.lang.Long startDateHour,
                     java.lang.Long endDateHour)
              throws DatabaseException,
                     ConnectionFailedException
        Description copied from interface: EditTaskViewController.Listener
        Validates the task and saves it into the database.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface EditTaskViewController.Listener
        Parameters:
        newDescription - the description of the task
        startDateHour - the startDate of the task in Epoch format
        endDateHour - the endDate of the task in Epoch format
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - throws a database exceptions when the validation fails.
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
